name: Your Setting Name
description: Brief description of your setting's weather system

descriptions.-10: Freezing (0° F) - Extreme cold, survival checks required
descriptions.-5: Cold (30° F) - The air is bitter cold
descriptions.5: Hot (90° F) - A very warm day

descriptions.-10: Dead Still - No wind at all, the air is completely stagnant
descriptions.-5: Light Breeze - Gentle movement of air, leaves rustle softly
descriptions.5: Strong Wind - Powerful gusts that can impede movement
descriptions.10: Gale Force - Extremely dangerous winds, difficult to stand

descriptions.-10: None - Clear skies without a cloud in sight
descriptions.-5: None - Some clouds but no rain

descriptions.-10: Extremely Dry - Parched air that cracks lips and skin
descriptions.5: Humid - Noticeable moisture in the air
descriptions.10: Very Humid - Air feels thick and oppressive

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: Dense woodland with tall trees providing shade
rules: Movement is Difficult terrain unless on a path

mountains.name: Mountains
mountains.description: High altitude peaks and rocky terrain
